code:
flowchart TD

    %% Positions
    WriterTop[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::mod
    ScholarLeft[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::mod
    VisRight[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::mod
    CodeBottom[FinTech_LedgerService]:::mod
    FilesCenter[FinTech_LedgerService]:::core

    %% Diamond Layout
    WriterTop --> FilesCenter
    ScholarLeft --> FilesCenter
    VisRight --> FilesCenter
    CodeBottom --> FilesCenter

    FilesCenter --> WriterTop
    FilesCenter --> ScholarLeft
    FilesCenter --> VisRight
    FilesCenter --> CodeBottom

    %% Cross-module synergy
    ScholarLeft --> WriterTop
    WriterTop  --> CodeBottom
    CodeBottom --> VisRight
    VisRight   --> WriterTop

    %% AI links
    AI[FinTech_LedgerService]:::ai
    AI --> WriterTop
    AI --> ScholarLeft
    AI --> VisRight
    AI --> CodeBottom

    %% Styles
    classDef core fill:#1f2a40,stroke:#88aaff,color:#ffffff,stroke-width:2px;
    classDef mod fill:#2e3b55,stroke:#aac7ff,color:#ffffff,stroke-width:1.5px;
    classDef ai fill:#3c4f6b,stroke:#ffcc66,color:#ffffff,stroke-width:1.5px;
license_name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0
repo_description: SciTeX Cloud - Scientific workflow platform with pip-installable CLI for deployment management
